text:
PlutoCon 2021 is finished, we had really wonderful talks and discussions, you can watch the <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xsK2358rA3Y&list=PLP8iPy9hna6T5sNOTeGdiqygHe_09geEW&index=1|whole event on youtube>, and be sure to check out our website, which includes live demo notebooks!

<https://plutojl.org/plutocon2021>

byeee -fons
